name: Summoner's Button
description:
A simple game wrapped around a series of lone buttons in rooms.   Battle scores of enemies to advance to the next floor.   Buy adventurers and items from the shop to help you as well as receive items from the item rooms on each floor.

Features 

  • 3 game difficulties
  • 10 floors
  • 100+ battles
  • Original art, tile sets ect.

Keyboard Controls

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Z or Space or Enter- Select
  • X - Back or Escape
  • Alt + Enter - Toggle full screen
  • F1 - Toggle controls

Controller Controls - can be changed and enabled in game in properties (F1) or or otherwise.

  • D Pad or Left Analog stick - Move
  • Button 2 - Back or Escape
  • Button 3 - Select
  • Button 1 - Sprint

The game is still in development and new features and suggestions are still open. I like to hear from you to see what can be done to make the game more interesting and enjoyable.   Some enemies and characters will be tweaked and stuff when I test out the game more.

Thanks for checking out the page and I hope you enjoy.   This is my fist game that I have published so much work is needed.
